oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |uma (XIII)
Da (XIV)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The names of |uma's and Da's parents. |uma's father's name is ||e-|kue and his mother's name is ||kabbe-!!ne-a (?). Da's father's name is |xoa-ku and his mother's is ||xauti. 1) This story is found in Book XI & XII-6.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: |uma and Da: the names of their parents
